channel.title: Debezium on reorchestrate
channel.description: Recent content in Debezium on reorchestrate

item.title: Debezium does not impact source database performance
item.description: Debezium is a Database Change-Data-Capture (aka CDC) tool that is able to decode open source and proprietary database logs, normalize them to a standard payload format and push them into a series of Kafka topics. It implements the Confluent Kafka Connect interface so is built to be highly-available, has development supported by RedHat and commercial support from Confluent. If you are even moderately interested in data and the reason for Change-Data-Capture is not obvious head immediately to watch this.
